gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 119, Rockets 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Rockets, 119-104. Bam Adebayo recorded 18 points, 12 rebounds and six assists for the Heat, while Tyler Herro added 17 points, five rebounds and six assists in his return after missing the previous 20 games. Jalen Green tallied 21 points, seven rebounds and four assists for the Rockets in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 43-34 on the season, while the Rockets fall to 38-39.
